title: Getting Started
content:
Welcome to the server! Here's how to get started:

1. Read the rules in the rules channel
2. Pick your roles in the roles channel
3. Introduce yourself in the introductions channel
4. Start chatting and have fun!

title: Server Rules
content:
1. Be respectful to all members
2. No spam or self-promotion
3. Keep conversations in the appropriate channels
4. No NSFW content outside designated channels
5. Follow Discord's Terms of Service
6. Listen to moderators

title: Roles
content:
Here's how our role system works:

• **Member** — Granted automatically when you join
• **Moderator** — Server staff who enforce rules
• **Admin** — Server administrators

Some roles may be self-assignable in the roles channel.
